text: I think were part of this movement that needs to push voice past novelty. It's going to be hard and it's kind of neat to see the missteps ("ok glass") - I can already sort of feel myself reacting negatively to the idea of my phone/tv/fridge listening to me all the time looking for key phrases, but realistically it's the only way to get there. I say: yay! Making voice input sane! Anyone want to talk about sphinx? Anyone?

attachments.title: likey
attachments.text: u really like something a lot
